title: Da Xiongmao Chuanqi
synopsis: The legendary "iron-eater" broke into the village, Xiaoqing and Guoshan brothers and sisters went deep into the mountains to look for the "iron-eater", but accidentally discovered that the so-called "iron-eater" was a pair of mother and child giant pandas fleeing for food. 　　 At the same time, the ferocious and cunning old snow leopard "one-eyed", the fierce and cruel red wolf, and the criminals seeking huge profits have all focused on the mother and child giant pandas, which is even worse for the endangered pandas. 　　 To help the fleeing mother and child giant pandas, Xiaoqing and Guoshan went deep into the mountain to deliver food for the mother and child giant pandas. The brothers and sisters not only have to face the dangerous natural environment, but also always beware of the ferocious beasts. But after they completed the task of delivering food to the mother and child of the giant panda and won the trust of the mother and child, they discovered that the mother and child were mysteriously missing. . The brothers and sisters looked for the mother and child of the giant panda based on various clues, but at this time the mother and child of the giant panda were already hungry and cold. Not only were they chased by criminals and had nowhere to hide, they were also ambushed by a red wolf, and the more vicious one-eyed leopard followed. Waiting for the opportunity. In order to protect the baby panda, the mother panda stepped forward resolutely and fought against criminals, red wolves and one-eyed leopards in Devil Ridge... 　　 Xiaoqing and Guoshan finally found the mother and child of the giant panda. With the help of Daddy Caowa, Dr. Leng and everyone, the giant panda was not only rescued successfully, but also accumulated valuable experience for scientific rescue of the giant panda.(translated from douban)
